q1: How many games do you play in a season
a2: Well they have a lot of matches between countries !
a3: How was Nigerian participation in the World Cup
q4: I think it was very good, despite being a small team
a4: True, they lost but they showed great brilliance
q5: Can Nigeria's participation at the last world cup be compared to their outing at the USA 94 world cup?
a5: It can, though they advanced to the knockouts in 1994 but didn't this year.
